name: Mommy's Princess Little Helper
description:
Mommy's house is a mess! Can you help Mom clean up her messy home in time for summer vacations? Taking care of your house can be very difficult! Mommy's Princess little Helper is an educational game which Helps school going kids to understand what chores need to be done around the home every day! This is an educational game which brings the opportunity for kids to learn & have fun in the amazing. Be the best Mommy's Princess little Helper around with tons of fun-filled, joyous & engaging home activities. Hey kids! Wash dirty dishes, prepare dinner, iron the laundry, tidy up the living room and more! Mom can't get anything right because she is so much exhausted & daddy is busy in his work! So Kids, help Mommy clean up & organize the messy home before daddy comes back home from work!

It’s Summer Vacation and kids have messed up the home, now mom has to sparkle up the messy house. Can you help mommy and cleanup the mess kids have made. Mommy's Princess little Helper is all about doing chores with mommy. In this cool messy home makeover, kids have to sparkle the house (kitchen, bathroom, living room). This game will help your toddler learn the basic home chores even if he is in kindergarten or going to attend school. So kids, are you ready for a real summer vacation cleanup? Become Mommy's Princess little Helper in this virtual adventures game and earn your rewards :).

Fun-Filled and Enchanted Educational Activities for Preschool Kids:

• Living Room: Vacuum and mop till the living room is sparkly!

• Iron the Laundry: Iron the wrinkly clothes, fold them & put them away!

• Clean the Dishes: Wash the dirty dishes in soapy water & put them away on the dish-rack.

• Cooking: Bake & decorate yummy cookies in the kitchen!

• Clean the Fridge: Neat & Decorate the fridge with magnets put the groceries away with Daddy!

• Dinner : Set the table with beautiful dishes for dinner! Show everyone how much you care!

• Toilet: Neat the messy toilet.
